Plot: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.
Title: Burlesque
Actors: Cher, Christina Aguilera, Eric Dane, Cam Gigandet
tomatoConsensus: Campy and clichéd, Burlesque wastes its talented cast (including a better-than-expected Christina Aguilera) on a movie that wavers uncertainly between "bad" and "so bad it's good."
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 14 nominations.
